name: indrasync
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen lights”
”Alexa, turn off bedroom lights”
”Alexa, dim the livingroom lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Voice based Smart Lighting Control for lights using Indrasync wireless technology. Supported lighting control technologies are Indrasync Wireless technology, DALI and CBUS systems.
